title: An attention-based view of AI assimilation in public sector organizations: The case of Saudi Arabia
research_description: This study investigates the challenges in AI assimilation in public sector organizations in Saudi Arabia using the attention-based view of the organization as the theoretical lens. The case study approach involved three Saudi public sector organizations.
research_results: The findings reveal five key challenges to AI assimilation: misalignment between AI and management decision-making, tensions with linguistics and national culture, challenges in AI infrastructure, data integrity and sharing issues, and ethical concerns.
future_research: Future research could focus on the long-term impact of AI assimilation on governance, data security, and organizational culture in the public sector.
